00012 #define     QUEST_DEBUG_FILE              "QuestDebug.txt"
00013 
00014 
00015 //enums used for the current output level flags
00016 enum
00017 {
00018       QD_OUTPUT_NONE,                     // no output
00019       QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_1,            // Highest level
00020       QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_2,
00021       QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_3,
00022       QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_4,
00023       QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_ALL,    // any message
00024 };
00025 
00026 
00027 
00028 
00029 //Mode and priority for the Quest Debug Messages
00030 UINT8 gubQuestDebugOutPutLevel = QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_ALL;
00031 
00032 //Mode and priority for the NPC interaction Debug Messages
00033 UINT8 gubNPCDebugOutPutLevel = QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_ALL;
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038 //set the current output mode for either the NPC or the quest output
00039 void ToggleQuestDebugModes( UINT8 ubType )
00040 {
00041       wchar_t     sType[16];
00042       UINT8 ubLevel;
00043 
00044       if( ubType == QD_NPC_MSG )
00045       {
00046             wcscpy( sType, L"NPC Debug:");
00047 
00048             //check to see if its out of range
00049             if( gubNPCDebugOutPutLevel <= QD_OUTPUT_NONE+1 )
00050                   gubNPCDebugOutPutLevel = QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_ALL;
00051             else
00052             {
00053                   //decrement
00054                   gubNPCDebugOutPutLevel--;
00055             }
00056 
00057             ubLevel = gubNPCDebugOutPutLevel;
00058       }
00059       else
00060       {
00061             wcscpy( sType, L"QUEST Debug:");
00062 
00063             //check to see if its out of range
00064             if( gubQuestDebugOutPutLevel <= QD_OUTPUT_NONE )
00065                   gubQuestDebugOutPutLevel = QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_ALL;
00066             else
00067             {
00068                   //decrement
00069                   gubQuestDebugOutPutLevel--;
00070             }
00071 
00072             ubLevel = gubQuestDebugOutPutLevel;
00073       }
00074 
00075       //Display a messasge to the screen
00076       if( ubLevel == QD_OUTPUT_NONE )
00077             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"%s No Output", sType );
00078       else if( ubLevel == QD_OUTPUT_LEVEL_ALL )
00079             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"%s All messages", sType );
00080       else
00081             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"%s Level %d", sType, ubLevel );
00082 }

00085 
00086 
00087 
00088 void QuestDebugFileMsg( UINT8 ubQuoteType, UINT8 ubPriority, STR pStringA, ...)
00089 {
00090       static BOOLEAN    fFirstTimeIn = TRUE;
00091       static UINT32           uiLineNumber = 1;
00092       HWFILE            hFile;
00093       UINT32            uiByteWritten;
00094   va_list         argptr;
00095   char                  TempString[1024];
00096   char                  DestString[1024];
00097 
00098 
00099       TempString[0] = '\0';
00100       DestString[0] = '\0';
00101 
00102       va_start(argptr, pStringA);         // Set up variable argument pointer
00103       vsprintf(TempString, pStringA, argptr);   // process gprintf string (get output str)
00104       va_end(argptr);
00105 
00106 
00107       //
00108       //determine if we should display the message
00109       //
00110 
00111       // if its a quest message
00112       if( ubQuoteType == QD_QUEST_MSG )
00113       {
00114             //if the message is a lower priority then the current output mode, dont display it
00115             if( ubPriority > gubQuestDebugOutPutLevel )
00116                   return;
00117       }
00118       else
00119       {
00120             //if the message is a lower priority then the current output mode, dont display it
00121             if( ubPriority > gubNPCDebugOutPutLevel )
00122                   return;
00123       }
00124 
00125 
00126       //if its the first time in the game
00127       if( fFirstTimeIn )
00128       {
00129             //open a new file for writing
00130 
00131             //if the file exists
00132             if( FileExists( QUEST_DEBUG_FILE ) )
00133             {
00134                   //delete the file
00135                   if( !FileDelete( QUEST_DEBUG_FILE ) )
00136                   {
00137                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FAILED to delete %s file", QUEST_DEBUG_FILE) );
00138                         return;
00139                   }
00140             }
00141             fFirstTimeIn = FALSE;
00142       }
00143 
00144 
00145       //open the file
00146       hFile = FileOpen( QUEST_DEBUG_FILE, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE, FALSE);
00147       if( !hFile )
00148       {
00149             FileClose(hFile);
00150             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FAILED to open Quest Debug File %s", QUEST_DEBUG_FILE) );
00151             return;
00152       }
00153 
00154 
00155       sprintf( DestString, "#%5d. P%d:\n\t%s\n\n", uiLineNumber, ubPriority, TempString );
00156 
00157       //open the file and append to it
00158       if( !FileWrite( hFile, DestString, strlen(DestString), &uiByteWritten ) )
00159       {
00160             FileClose(hFile);
00161             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FAILED to write to %s", QUEST_DEBUG_FILE) );
00162             return;
00163       }
00164 
00165       //increment the line number
00166       uiLineNumber++;
00167 }
